DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Holiday Designs Paint Set (8 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Marela Murad has written another winner, "The Holiday Face Painting Book" And we sell it as a kit with Snazaroo paints. The kit includes the Face Painting Book of Holiday Designs and eight Snazaroo 2 ml face paints (White, Black, Bright Pink, Bright Green, Red, Light Blue, Yellow and Orange). Murad ("Mama Clown") wrote The Holiday Face Painting Book in collaboration with her daughter and it has 50 original, extraordinary, yet simple holiday face paint designs, covering everything from Christmas, to Hanukkah and Kwanzaa, Valentines to Independence Day, to the celebration of Queen's day and Canada Day. Marela Murad is an original, one of the pioneers in the face painting world. The book includes easy step-by-step instructions that will make your holiday face painting a snap. They range from simple Valentine's hearts to advanced Christmas face paint designs.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
The Holiday Face Painting Kit also comes with a sturdy plastic traveling case.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 8 color Snazaroo Holiday Face Painting Kit will paint well over 50 faces
Snazaroo paints come in 2 ml sizes and include White, Black, Bright Pint, Bright Green, Red Light Blue, Yellow and Orange
56 pages and over 50 face painting designs
Snazaroo paints are non toxic, hypoallergenic and the most child friendly face paints on the market
The Kit and Book come with a handy carrying case
